channel.title: Timer Sitting Emote
channel.description:
Alright I made an emote Where You sit On air... but i want to use is so it does this:
In my source you can be online for 5 Hours without logging out.
I want to make so after not touching the client for 30 seconds, The character is starting to do my sitting emote...
I almost got it going but... it fails...
some assistance pl0x

item.title: Timer Sitting Emote
item.dc:creator: @twins twins
item.description:
@twins wrote:

AAAAhh i give up…

doesnt work.

Read full topic

item.title: Timer Sitting Emote
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

Declare this with your other ints:

public int isSitting = 30;
public boolean isSittingDown = false;

In your process boolean:

if (!isActive && isSittingDown == false)
{
      isSitting--;
}
if(!isActive && isSittingDown == false && isSitting == 0)
{
      startEmote(YouremoteID);
      isSittingDown == true;
}

That should work, just threw it together here.

I’m not sure that is what the isActive boolean is used for though, so it might not work.

If none of the above code works. Try this:

Find in your client class:

case 202:

and make it:

[CODE]
case 202:
startEmote(EMOTE ID);
break;

[/code]

[/quote]

EDIT: Mucked my code up.

Read full topic

item.title: Timer Sitting Emote
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

Declare this with your other ints:

public int isSitting = 30;
public boolean isSittingDown = false;

In your process boolean:

if (!isActive == false && isSittingDown == false)
{
      isSitting--;
}
if(!isActive && isSittingDown == false && isSitting == 0)
{
      startEmote(YouremoteID);
      isSittingDown == true;
}

That should work, just threw it together here.

I’m not sure that is what the isActive boolean is used for though, so it might not work.

If none of the above code works. Try this:

Find in your client class:

case 202:

and make it:

[CODE]
case 202:
startEmote(EMOTE ID);
break;

[/code]

Read full topic
